meanings.definition: The state or quality of being silent.
meanings.sent1: Her silentness during the test was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The silentness of the library allowed for peaceful studying.
meanings.sent3: The silentness of the ninja made him the perfect spy.
meanings.sent4: The silentness of the forest at night was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The silentness of the snowfall was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The absence of sound or noise.
meanings.sent1: The silentness in the room made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The silentness of the desert was calming.
meanings.sent3: The silentness of the empty house felt lonely.
meanings.sent4: The silentness of the graveyard was haunting.
meanings.sent5: The silentness of the vacuum cleaner was a relief after the loud party.
